description: Kitamura Eri (Kobayashi Sanpeita`s VA) reads out loud chapter 20 from volume 3 of the manga.

titles.title: Gensaku Manga o Yomu -MANDOKU- Dai 684 Kai: Project.20 "Kettei! Akebono Bijin"
Reading Original Manga -MANDOKU- Episode 684: Project.20 "It`s Decided! Beauty of the Dawn"
原作漫画を読む -MANDOKU- 第684回: Project.20「決定! あけぼの美人」
